verses.name: Judges 8:22
verses.text: Then the men of Israel said unto Gideon, Rule thou over us, both thou, and thy son, and thy son’s son also: for thou hast delivered us from the hand of Midian.

verses.name: Judges 8:23
verses.text: And Gideon said unto them, I will not rule over you, neither shall my son rule over you: the Lord shall rule over you.

verses.name: Judges 8:24
verses.text: And Gideon said unto them, I would desire a request of you, that ye would give me every man the earrings of his prey. (For they had golden earrings, because they were Ishmaelites.)
